title: 'The European Green Deal is our growth strategy': EU unveils sweeping 'Fit for 55' strategy
lead: Brussels launches major package of accelerated decarbonisation measures, including tax reforms, new clean energy targets, and carbon border tariffs ...

title: Green Party co-leader Sian Berry to stand down

title: New government fund backs natural solutions for tackling escalating climate risks
lead: Natural Environment Investment Readiness Fund provides up to £100,000 to 27 nature-based climate projects across England  ...

title: Which? reveals how carbon-conscious holidaymakers face higher travel fares
lead: Which? investigation reveals how planes continue to beat trains on ticket prices, despite much higher carbon impacts ...

title: Chairs of 14 major UK pension funds commit to net zero investment portfolios

title: 'A race for the future': SailGP embeds new sustainability league into global sailing competition
lead: International racing teams will be scored on their sustainability performance as they participate in global sailing competition, sport body reveals ...

title: Future Energy Scenarios 2021: Power generation in Britain could be emissions net negative by 2034

title: Fossil fuel power generation has peaked worldwide, think tanks claim

title: Government targets net zero planes, roads and railways in 'landmark' green transport strategy

title: Amazon expands climate-friendly product badge system in US and Europe

title: NatWest launches carbon footprint tracker for its mobile banking app
lead: High street bank claims feature built by carbon tracking expert CoGo is a first for a UK bank ...

title: 'Extremely disappointing': Water sector failing on pollution goals, Environment Agency warns
lead: None of England's nine water and sewerage firms achieved all environmental expectations between 2015 and 2020, watchdog reveals ...

title: Google Cloud upgrades effort to flag greenest data centres
lead: Update to region picker aims to make it easier for customers to switch to the lowest carbon regions for their Cloud computing services ...

title: Salary sacrifice: 500th EDF employee taps EV car benefits scheme

title: Clean laundry: Unilever and Arzeda team up for sustainable enzymes push

title: UN publishes first draft of Paris Agreement-style global treaty for tackling biodiversity loss

title: 'Power shift': Mayors and council leaders demand new powers to support net zero action

title: INEOS Grangemouth site signs up to Scottish carbon capture cluster

title: Sustainable Sussex: University debuts sweeping new sustainability strategy

title: 'Fundamentally undervalues the group': Good Energy resists latest takeover offers from arch rival Ecotricity

title: Net Zero Tracker: Listed companies have less than six years left to align with 1.5C goal

title: Energy professionals call for national skills policy to enable net zero transition

title: Insurers for net zero: Major insurance firms launch Net Zero Insurance Alliance

lead: Company admitted to 6,971 illegal spills from 17 sites in Hampshire, Kent and West Sussex between 2010 and 2015 ...

title: The startup helping P&G, Mercedes-Benz replace petrochemicals

title: Enel links $4bn bond to its climate goals in 'world record' green transaction

title: DPD and ENSO team up to trial new green EV tyres
